definition: overhaul
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
dried meat/private teacher's remuneration/withered/variant of 修[xiu1]
surname Xiu
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
abbey/large monastery or convent
abbot

sentences.english: First, the computer gong overhaul, restoration of precision machine tools.
sentences.chinese: 电脑锣大修，恢复机床精度。
化油器往往需要大修或清洁。

sentences.english: Our company are provide screw type compressor of overhaul service.
sentences.chinese: 本公司提供大修缧杆式压缩机之服务。

sentences.english: He abused his car by not changing the oil, and now it needs major repairs.
sentences.chinese: 他用车用得太狠，老不加油，现在车须要大修了。

sentences.english: We had the winch overhauled last year.
sentences.chinese: 去年我们对绞车大修过一次。

sentences.english: And my car might need to go also like very major repairs.
sentences.chinese: 而且我的车看起来得大修。

sentences.english: He abused his car by not changing the oil,and now it needs major repairs.
sentences.chinese: 他用车用得太狠，老不加油，现在车需要大修了。

sentences.english: When that will happen is not clear.
sentences.chinese: 但这场“大修”将何时发生还不清楚。

sentences.english: Disk hub corrosion damages of a Beilun Power Plant's circulation pump were detected during the pump's overhaul.
sentences.chinese: 北仑电厂某机循泵在大修中发现轮毂腐蚀的缺陷。

sentences.english: What else does the Reverend Mother say?
sentences.chinese: 大修女又说了什么事了呢？

sentences.english: The result shows that the effective service life of the overhauled and reformed hopper car can be prolonged.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，经过大修改造的漏斗车可延长有效使用期。

sentences.english: He now intends to contribute his own ideas to the field through postgraduate research at the University.
sentences.chinese: 他现在科大修读研究生课程，为这个领域作出贡献。

sentences.english: The Queen Elizabeth II was in dock for major repair.
sentences.chinese: 伊丽莎白二世号停泊在船坞大修。

sentences.english: When it's off target or needs tweaking or even an overhaul?
sentences.chinese: 当目标已经偏离或需要小改，甚至大修？

sentences.english: This paper introduces some doing ways and realizations of overhaul engineering of Chengping highway.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了程平公路大修工程的一些做法和体会。
